title: Strategies To Boost Tourism Further
text: Emergency services Maintaining hospitals, libraries, museums, parks The provision for development of new infrastructure has been laid down in the framework by the tourism department. There will be many changes and implementations to achieve the objectives in this area. Key target markets Auckland is well placed to take advantage of the increasing demand for international travel. The extensive marketing plans include targeting places like Australia, the US, China, Japan, UK and Indonesia through campaigns and tactical marketing activities supported by diverse media strategies. Tourism awards The popularity of Auckland is well established throughout the world. The city has a number of international awards and accolades to its credit. Auckland was rated as one of the world’s Top 10 Cities to Visit in Lonely Planet’s ‘Best in Travel 2014’ guide It ranked third in the list of world’s most liveable city in the Mercer Quality of Living scale for 2012 and 2013 It was named the third best sports city in the world in the prestigious 2013 ISEM Sport City Awards It was named as Australasia’s top destination in the World Travel Awards 2012 It’s Waiheke Island, in the Hauraki Gulf, found a mention in The New York Times in its ‘46 Places to Go in 2013’ guide These awards and honours is an endorsement of Auckland’s unparallel recognition as one of the most sought after tourist destination. About Auckland Auckland’s stunning harbour, serene islands, pulsating citylife and a range of leisure activities together make it a desirable destination. The city has so much to offer to its travelers that it is difficult to travel around all of them in a single trip. The perfect mix of urban, water and wildlife push tourists to visit the place again and again. They book cheap flight to Auckland from UK to explore this big world of new experiences.
